name: Global Native
tag_list: experiential-travel-worldwide, off-beat-travel-worldwide, local-tours-worldwide, best-tour-operator-for-tours-out-of-india, best-tour-operator-italy, insider-tours-worldwide, insider-tours-italy, insider-tours-spain, insider-tours-turkey, business-tour-ad
overview:
Global Native provides a fresh perspective to the idea of international travel for the Indian travelers. Unlike all other big and small travel companies that keep selling only the best selling destinations over and over again, either in a bid to provide the cheapest package available or if providing a semi-experiential package than the cost is just 4 times of what it can be, global native has a fresh approach towards it all. It has a strong network across many countries for selling select itineraries that are strictly experiential in nature.

Global Native packages popular destinations in a unique way with activities like culinary lessons, guided nature walks, off-beat trails, cheese and wine tastings, craft lessons, meal with a local family and various other authentic activities the destination offers. Apart from the popular destinations, global native has new destinations like Campania on their website breaking grounds in terms of travel horizons for Indians.

The company supports the cause of Toilet construction for the unprivileged and are associated with a Swiss company working towards constructing these toilets. The staff at Global Native participates at ground level in this initiative and are the Indian associates for the swiss company in India. More details will be available soon on their website.

Global Native is the co-brand of their flagship Inbound travel brand ‘Its about the journey’ URL www.itsaboutthejourney.in
